contentrichtext.text: <!-- FAIR USE of Brand Kola Real Plastic Bottle 625 ml.jpg: see image description page at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Image:Brand Kola Real Plastic Bottle 625 ml.jpg for rationale --> {{Infobox Beverage |name = Kola Real |logo = [[File:Big Cola Logo 2012.svg|200px]] |image = [[Image:Brand Kola Real Plastic Bottle 625 ml.jpg|200px]] |type = [[Soft-drink]] |manufacturer = [[Ajegroup]] |origin = [[Peru]] |introduced = 23 June 1988 |discontinued = |related = [[Coca-Cola]], [[Inca Kola]] |variants = cola, orange, strawberry, pineapple, lemon }} '''Kola Real''' is a [[Peru]]vian [[soft drink]]. Kola Real is one of the most popular brands of [[Ajegroup]],<ref>[http://www.ajegroup.com/web/ajegroup/product_kolareal.jsp Ajegroup (peruvian grupo) Kola Real product information]</ref> a leader in the [[Latin America]]n beverage market. Started in [[Peru]] on June 23, 1988 in the middle of a coup d'Ã©tat, the company has grown and expanded not only in [[Peru]], but also in [[Cuba]], [[Ecuador]], [[Dominican Republic]], [[Venezuela]], [[Costa Rica]], [[Mexico]], [[Colombia]] and [[Thailand]]. Kola Real is available in many flavours such as "revolution red" (strawberry), orange, pineapple, lime-lemon, "negra" ("black", similar to [[Coca-Cola]]) and "dorada" ("golden", similar to [[Inca Kola]]). In [[Mexico]], [[Costa Rica]], [[Colombia]], [[Venezuela]], [[Ecuador]], [[Indonesia]] and [[Thailand]], Kola Real "negra" is known as '''Big Cola'''. ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.corante.com/goingglobal/archives/2003/11/01/kola_real_takes_on_cocacola.php Kola Real Takes on Coca-Cola] *[http://logisticstoday.com/sNO/6366/iID/20876/LT/displayStory.asp In Mexico, Big Cola is the real thing ]{{Dead link|date=June 2011}} *[http://vheadline.org/readnews.asp?id=23239 Soft drinks Ajeven invests US$1.5 million to expand production in Venezuela] {{Portal box|Drink|Peru}} {{Brands of Ajegroup}} {{colas}} [[Category:Cola brands]] [[Category:Peruvian cuisine]] [[Category:Peruvian beverages]] [[Category:Products introduced in 1988]]
